class_f_02_dragon_01: Hello, class! It is I, Hassel, yet again.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_02:
In our previous class, we discussed what beauty
is...which might have been a little boring for you.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_03:
So today, I thought I would mix things up a little
to pique your interest in art.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_04: Allow me to introduce our special guest![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_05:
This is Professor Gible, the assistant lecturer
for today.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_06:
Now then, Professor Gible. If you would be so
kind as to Terastallize for us...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_07:
As some of you may already know, a Pokémon
can Terastallize if you use a Tera Orb.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_08:
Normally, Professor Gible would be of the
Dragon type...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_09:
But by Terastallizing, it’s succeeded in changing
its type![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_10:
So, class...what type do these lovely, glistening
flowers above Professor Gible’s head represent?[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_answer_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Excellent, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Full marks\r
for you![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_answer_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Ah, not quite, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
Actually,\r
the\r
type\r
in\r
question\r
is\r
weak\r
to\r
the\r
Fire type![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_answer_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Ah, not quite, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
Actually,\r
the\r
type\r
in\r
question\r
is\r
strong\r
against\r
the\r
Water type![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_11:
These beautiful flowers blooming above
Professor Gible’s head show that it has now\r
become a Grass type.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_12:
The shape of the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Tera Jewel[VAR COLOR(0000)] above a Pokémon’s
head depends on the Pokémon’s Tera Type.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_13:
To summarize! If an opponent’s Pokémon
Terastallizes during battle...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_14:
observe a Pokémon’s Tera Jewel closely to see
which type it has become![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_16:
It is my sincere hope that today’s lecture will
help you all achieve beautiful victories.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_17:
The Terastal phenomenon is indeed a fascinating
and deep subject to discuss.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_02_dragon_18:
That is it for today, class! Thank you, Professor
Gible, for your help.[VAR 0114(0012)]
